attributes.action: Make Travelling for Children Free on Public Transport to Reduce Congestion at Peak Times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the amount of parents taking children to work it massively increases the amount of traffic in the mornings. With the introduction of free travel on public transport for children this would dramatically reduce the amount of congestion and also make best use of them bus lanes that are used once every 30 seconds at peak times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
